title: Fireside with the Underboss - "They Dumped Trumps Toxic Waste and Ended Up Dead"
description: A demolition contract is given to one of Sammy's guys, to clear space for the building of Donald Trump's "Trump Tower".  Toxic waste is found in the debris. A man named Weiss is suspected to be informing. Sammy is given the hit, but it goes sideways.
itunes:author: Sammy "The Bull" Gravano
